getAuthenticationToken

public java.lang.String getAuthenticationToken(java.lang.String accountSecret,
                                               java.lang.String name,
                                               java.lang.String id,
                                               int role)
                                        throws java.lang.Exception
Get an external authentication token for a user

Parameters:
accountSecret - account secret (from DevPortal)
name - user name
id - user ID
role - user role
Returns:
external authentication token as HTTP request parameter
Throws:
java.lang.Exception
